Playing with markdown

Mar 13, 2018

Hello world again. I’m learning like a newborn exploring a brand new world, but I’ve been distracted because I’ve found my hands and they’re fun to look at and put in my mouth.

I’ve always wanted to create a blog and code, so when I saw that you could create a blog hosted on Github, it felt like the pieces were coming together. This guy had a Youtube tutorial and a website and this woman had a really easy to follow tutorial on how to setup a Jekyll blog.

Still, nothing is straight forward and even writing text envolves knowing a language.

Here’s a list:

  • first!
  • second
  • sassy

Cool. Now here’s a quotation (while adding a break and escaping the dash):

You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take - Wayne Gretzky
- Michael Scott

And pictures are great and so is coffee:
